title: 正版直接连接，我当主机，打了一会儿就报错了。
author: suii_mine
txt_content:
只玩了2天，有5个小伙伴，我设置了5G的存储量，不知道是不是因为这个，我发下报错信息。

-- System Details --
Details:
        Minecraft Version: 1.8
        Operating System: Windows 7 (amd64) version 6.1
        Java Version: 1.8.0_25, Oracle Corporation
        Java VM Version: Java HotSpot(TM) 64-Bit Server VM (mixed mode), Oracle Corporation
        Memory: 345893056 bytes (329 MB) / 718483456 bytes (685 MB) up to 5355339776 bytes (5107 MB)
        JVM Flags: 6 total; -XX:HeapDumpPath=MojangTricksIntelDriversForPerformance_javaw.exe_minecraft.exe.heapdump -Xmx5G -XX:+UseConcMarkSweepGC -XX:+CMSIncrementalMode -XX:-UseAdaptiveSizePolicy -Xmn128M
        IntCache: cache: 0, tcache: 0, allocated: 12, tallocated: 94
        FML: MCP v9.10 FML v8.0.37.1332 Minecraft Forge 11.14.1.1332 3 mods loaded, 3 mods active
        mcp{9.05} [Minecraft Coder Pack] (minecraft.jar) Unloaded->Constructed->Pre-initialized->Initialized->Post-initialized->Available->Available->Available->Available
        FML{8.0.37.1332} [Forge Mod Loader] (forge-1.8-11.14.1.1332.jar) Unloaded->Constructed->Pre-initialized->Initialized->Post-initialized->Available->Available->Available->Available
        Forge{11.14.1.1332} [Minecraft Forge] (forge-1.8-11.14.1.1332.jar) Unloaded->Constructed->Pre-initialized->Initialized->Post-initialized->Available->Available->Available->Available
        Loaded coremods (and transformers): 
        Profiler Position: N/A (disabled)
        Player Count: 2 / 8; [EntityPlayerMP['Suii_Hero'/331, l='Suii&Jyp&Cq', x=-213.52, y=64.00, z=112.32], EntityPlayerMP['MyBigBoy_HUNGer'/14090, l='Suii&Jyp&Cq', x=-149.66, y=68.00, z=482.12]]
        Type: Integrated Server (map_client.txt)
        Is Modded: Definitely; Client brand changed to 'fml,forge'



请大神帮忙

replies.author: lichi2050
replies.txt_content: 这个你是系统信息，报错在上面的部分

replies.author: 丨龙少丨
replies.txt_content: 这是因为你后台没有开启正版链接！你要找卖家开启哦！如果你的服务器是租的！如果是自己开的就加我QQ截图聊！

replies.author: suii_mine
replies.txt_content:
我再复制下错误信息，回3楼我这个是直接链接，我单机开启局域网，根本没有服务器。
